#Hydration

```{r}
df_all_groups <- wk_figs %>% 
  mutate(tree_week = paste(tree, week, sep = "_")
  ) %>% 
  mutate(water_potential = water_potential)
  
df_grey <- df_all_groups

df_1 <- df_all_groups %>% 
  filter(week %in% c('14'))

df_2 <- df_all_groups %>% 
  filter(week %in% c('17'))

df_3 <- df_all_groups %>% 
  filter(week %in% c('21'))

df_4 <- df_all_groups %>% 
  filter(week %in% c('37'))

nice_hydration_layered_1 <- ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, shape = time), data = df_grey, color = "grey") +
    geom_line(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, group = tree_week), color = "grey", data = df_grey) +
    geom_point(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, shape = time, color = "df_1"), 
               data = df_1 ) +
    geom_line(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, group = tree_week, color = "df_1"), 
              data = df_1) +
    geom_point(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, shape = time, color = "df_2"), 
               data = df_2) +
    geom_line(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, group = tree_week, color = "df_2"), 
              data = df_2) +
    geom_point(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, shape = time, color = "df_4"), 
               data = df_4) +
    geom_line(aes(y = water_potential, x = lwa_g_cm2, group = tree_week, color = "df_4"), 
              data = df_4
              )  +
    scale_colour_manual(name = 'Week', 
         values =c("df_1" ="#528791", 
                   "df_2"="#8E9D30",
                  # "df_3"="#EC7E28",
                   "df_4"="#CC5265"
                   ), 
         labels = c('14',
                    '17',
                  #  '21',
                    '33')) +
    labs(y = "Water Potential (MPa)", 
       x = "Leaf Water/Area (g/cm2)", 
       color= "Week", 
       shape = "Time"
       #caption = "triangles = predawn, circles = midday"
       ) +
  theme(
    #legend.position = c(.9, .35),
    legend.position = "none",
  #strip.background = element_blank(),
  #strip.text.y = element_blank(), 
  #strip.text.x = element_text(size = 16), 
  # axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12), 
   axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12), 
   axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12),
    # axis.text.x  = element_blank(),
  #axis.ticks.y = element_blank(), 
  #axis.title.y = element_blank()
  axis.title.x = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  legend.title = element_text(size = 14), 
  legend.text = element_text(size = 14), 
# legend.position = "none"
  ) +
  #scale_x_reverse() +
scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::number_format(accuracy = 0.1))
```

SD

```{r, eval = FALSE}
#Time
ran_df_tree_before_vs_after <- bind_rows(bef_ran_df_tree_before, lin_ran_df_tree_after)

ef <- ran_df_tree_before_vs_after %>% 
  group_by(time_season) %>% 
  mutate(sd = sd(slope),
         slope = mean(slope), 
         mean_se = mean(std.error.slope),
        mean_std.error = mean(std.error),
        upr_sd = slope + mean_std.error,
        lwr_sd = slope - mean_std.error,
         upr = slope + mean_se,
         lwr = slope - mean_se,
         time_season = as.factor(time_season)) 

time_summary <- ef %>% 
ggplot(aes(color = time_season)) + 
  geom_point(aes(y = slope, x = time_season), size =2) +
    geom_point(aes(y = upr, x = time_season), size = 1) +
  geom_point(aes(y = lwr, x = time_season), size = 1) +
  geom_segment(aes(y= lwr, 
                   yend = upr, 
                   x = time_season, 
                   xend = time_season)) +

  labs(
   y = "",
       x = "Time") +
  color_two_grey +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype="dotted") + 
  theme(legend.position="none",
      strip.background = element_blank(),
      strip.text.x = element_text(size = 12),
      plot.title = element_text(size=13),
      axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15),
      #axis.title.x = element_text(size = 13),
      axis.title.x = element_blank(),
     axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
     legend.key=element_blank(), 
     legend.text = element_text(size = 13), 
     legend.title = element_text(size = 16),
     legend.margin=margin(0,0,0,0),
      legend.box.margin=margin(-5,-8,-8,-8)
    ) +
    scale_x_discrete(limits=rev)
  
time_summary
```
